body: query {campaignlistbyproductschedule (productschedule: "12529a17-ac32-4e46-b05b-83862843055d") { campaigns { id, name, created_at, updated_at, productschedules { id, merchantprovidergroup{ id, merchantproviderconfigurations { merchantprovider { id, name, processor { name, id }, processing { monthly_cap, discount_rate, transaction_fee, reserve_rate, maximum_chargeback_ratio}, enabled, gateway { name, username, password, endpoint, additional }, allow_prepaid, accepted_payment_methods, customer_service { email, url, description }, created_at, updated_at }, distribution }, created_at, updated_at }, schedule { price, start, end, period, product { id, name, sku, ship, shipping_delay, fulfillment_provider { id, name, provider { name } } } } } emailtemplates { id, name, subject, body, type, smtp_provider{ id, name, hostname, username, password, port } } }, pagination { count, end_cursor, has_next_page } } }
